body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Fire Management              Fire Management       With 95% of the park's acreage covered by water, fire management is generally not a big issue at Biscayne National Park. National Park Service policy though dictates that every NPS unit with burnable vegetation must develop a fire management plan (FMP). Read Biscayne National Park's FMP here.
title: Biscayne National Park: Fire Management
